title: The Battle of Billy's pond
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
Children's Film Foundation (London, England), production company
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Water - Pollution
description: When enthusiastic young fisherman, Billy, and his friend, Gobby, find their favourite pond polluted with dead fish floating on the surface, they decide to investigate. The boys discover that the pond has been poisoned by industrial waste. Based on the book by Howard Thompson.
